97af8c75-a0e9-4815-861e-564b54138631.subject: Invitation | HR Conclave 2026 – Talent, Leadership & Future Workforce | 7 Feb | Hyderabad
97af8c75-a0e9-4815-861e-564b54138631.message:
Dear [Mr./Ms./Dr.] [[name]],

Warm greetings from Sphoorthy Engineering College, Hyderabad.

Conclave Objective

HR Conclave 2026 is an industry–academia initiative bringing together senior HR professionals from technology organizations to discuss talent transformation, leadership, and future workforce readiness.

Panel Themes

HR professionals may participate in or observe panel discussions on:


Collaborating Associations

The conclave is being organized in collaboration with leading professional and industry bodies:


📅 Date: 7 February 2026

📍 Venue: Sphoorthy Engineering College, Hyderabad

Recognition & Participation

All registered and attending HR professionals will receive formal recognition as part of the conclave.

During registration, participants may select the recognition category aligned with their professional expertise.

Registration

If this aligns with your interests, we would be honoured by your presence.

Kindly register using the link below:

🔗 Registration Link:

[[invitation_url]]

Venue Location

📍 Sphoorthy Engineering College, Hyderabad

https://maps.app.goo.gl/nLvSyUAiA1KRkFTh9?g_st=ic

For any clarifications, please feel free to contact us:

📧 Email: placements@sphoorthyengg.ac.in

🔗 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sphoorthy-engineering-college/

We sincerely look forward to the opportunity of welcoming you to HR Conclave 2026.

Warm regards, Dr D Hemanath, Training and Placement Officer, 9121001921, 9885700310 Sphoorthy Engineering College, Hyderabad.

a4180ad5-2aa6-4e4e-b47e-994054539883.subject: Invitation | HR Conclave 2026 – Talent, Leadership & Future Workforce | 7 Feb | Hyderabad
a4180ad5-2aa6-4e4e-b47e-994054539883.message:
Dear [[name]],

Warm greetings from Sphoorthy Engineering College, Hyderabad.

Conclave Objective

HR Conclave 2026 is an industry–academia initiative bringing together senior HR professionals from technology organizations to discuss talent transformation, leadership, and future workforce readiness.

Panel Themes

HR professionals may participate in or observe panel discussions on:

AI & Automation in Talent Acquisition – Redefining hiring practices

Industry–Academia Collaboration – Creating employable graduates

Skill Up: The New Learning Curve – Building tomorrow's talent through continuous learning and upskilling

Collaborating Associations

The conclave is being organized in collaboration with leading professional and industry bodies:

NHRD – National Human Resource Development Network

ISTD – Indian Society for Training & Development

FTCCI – Federation of Telangana Chambers of Commerce and Industry

DEET – Digital Employment Exchange of Telangana

ICT – Information and Communication Technology Academy

TASK – Telangana Academy for Skill and Knowledge

📅 Date: 7 February 2026

📍 Venue: Sphoorthy Engineering College, Hyderabad

Recognition & Participation

All registered and attending HR professionals will receive formal recognition as part of the conclave.

During registration, participants may select the recognition category aligned with their professional expertise.

Registration

If this aligns with your interests, we would be honoured by your presence.

Kindly register using the link below:

Registration

If this aligns with your interests, we would be honoured by your presence.

Kindly register using the link below:

🔗 Registration Link:

[[invitation_url]]

Venue Location

📍 Sphoorthy Engineering College, Hyderabad

For any clarifications, please feel free to contact us:

📧 Email: placements@sphoorthyengg.ac.in

🔗 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sphoorthy-engineering-college/

We sincerely look forward to the opportunity of welcoming you to HR Conclave 2026.

Warm regards,

Dr. D. Hemanath Dussa

Training and Placement Officer

Sphoorthy Engineering College, Hyderabad
